idea-plugin.name: Naming Style Converter
idea-plugin.description:
Naming Style Converter

A powerful IntelliJ IDEA plugin that supports naming style conversion for multiple programming languages.

Supported Naming Styles:

  • Camel Case (camelCase) - First letter lowercase, subsequent words capitalized
  • Pascal Case (PascalCase) - All words capitalized
  • Snake Case (snake_case) - Words separated by underscores, all lowercase
  • Kebab Case (kebab-case) - Words separated by hyphens, all lowercase

Key Features:

  • Intelligent recognition of current naming style
  • One-click cycling through all naming styles
  • Support for selected text conversion
  • Support for cursor position word conversion
  • Integrated into context menu and edit menu

Usage:

Select the text to convert or position the cursor on a word, then press Ctrl+Alt+Q shortcut to cycle through conversions, or use the right-click menu to select conversion options.
